metadata.title: CVE-2018-14350 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Mutt before 1.10.1 and NeoMutt before2018-07-16. imap/message.c has a stack-based buffer overflow for a FETCHresponse with a long INTERNALDATE field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.9.4-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
mutt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-3ubuntu0.1').
